title: What are some of the high income skills? - Quora

response.answer_text: 5 Top high-income skills:- Many people are asking that “What are the high-income skills that can develop today and that will free people from financial struggles and worries forever?” High-income skills don’t mean a high-income job. It is a very particular skillset that you can develop to the marketplace. No.1:- Youtube The power of being a YouTuber is a great high-income skill. It takes a little while to get it going but once you get it going, you can essence revenue.you can also share your passion, hobbies. It is a good way to make a living. You get to help people. You can also see how your videos, how your message, how your story is impacting people around the world. I think that’s a pretty special high-income skill. You can watch the below video:  No.2:- Digital marketing Digital marketing includes all marketing attempts using an electronic device or the internet. Businesses use digital channels such as search engines, social media, email, and other websites to communicate with present and prospective clients. You can help people to manage Facebook, Instagram, any of the social media platform. You can charge a good amount of money helping them with this. You are helping entrepreneurs to make money. No 3:- Communication skill Communication skills enable you to comprehend and be understood by others. It will help you to share your thoughts with others, participating in discussions, providing and receiving critical feedback and public speaking. You will not be able to create wealth without being a good communicator. No.4 Consulting/Coaching Consultants can charge thousands for their service because their time is valued when they help a client see a transformation in their life or business. No.5 Copywriting Copywriting for those who do not understand the art of selling through words, the act of composing the text for advertising or other types of marketing. If you want to become a copywriter, you’ll find a suitable mentor online or offline.

A high-income skill is a skill that delivers value to the marketplace, that you can charge a lot of money to deliver. High-Income skills allow you to work more independently because of its high demand. High-income skills also provide more job and financial security because one can control prices and income. Moreover, it also provides work flexibility. But no field can guarantee you any definite growth and income as A famous quote by Sam Walton says: There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else. With the constant rise in the Technology Industry, we can’t deny the constant demand for the IT personnel. You need a different set of education and skills to be successful in the IT Industry. Like having soft and Professional skills will always prove to be an add on to your profile. Professional skills include skills like Disciple, self-motivation, Leadership Quality etc. Some more non-technical skills are: Project Management techniques. Presentation Skills or Public speaking skills. Interpersonal Communication skills. Time Management. Problem-solving and critical thinking skills. Research skills. In order to fall into the high income earning category, you have been competent in both Technical and Soft skills. Labour force projection 2020 published by the US Bureau of Labor Statistics, predicts that there will be an increment of 20.5 million jobs by 2020. The report predicts only a few profiles will grow more than 50% of the total in 2020 only. These profiles majorly include Information Technology domain. Some of the highest Paying skills in IT Industry are: 1. Big data engineer 2. Mobile applications developer 3. Information systems security manager 4. Applications architect 5. Data architect 6. Database manager 7. Data security analyst 8. Software engineer 9. Wireless network/cloud engineer 10. Data scientist 11. Senior web developer 12. Systems engineer. Thanks for reading.
